text: Ransom is a 1974 British thriller movie directed by Caspar Wrede and starring Sean Connery, Ian McShane, Christopher Ellison, Jeffry Wickham, Isabel Dean, Robert Harris. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1974 thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:Movies about extortion Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Ransom (1975 movie)
